Hero.title: Our mission: to be a reliable, high-quality, and innovative partner that enhances the competitiveness and strength of our clients.
Hero.description: With over 30 years of experience in the fish processing industry for the professional HoReCa and retail segments in the Croatian market, our goals position us as a reliable partner in the EU market.

Products.title: PRODUCTS
Products.subTitle: We offer a wide range of frozen, fresh, smoked, dried, marinated, and salted seafood products. Additionally, we have the McCain program, frozen vegetables, pasta, meat, and vegan meat substitutes in our selection.

Numbers.title: MARIKOMERC GROUP IN NUMBERS
Numbers.subTitle: The growth in quantities, revenues, capacities, and the volume of deliveries characterizes our Marikomerc group.
Numbers.capacityNumber: The capacity to receive trucks in one day.
Numbers.capacity4: The total capacity in the n° of pallets at +4°C.
Numbers.capacity25: The total capacity in the n° of pallets at -25°C.
Numbers.volume: The average annual volume of processed own products.

Map.title: Where does our fish come from
Map.text:
We import frozen fish and seafood from all parts of the world. In product selection, we have always been guided by quality. High-quality seafood is our philosophy, our brand, and our commitment to you.

Following our philosophy, we have established strong relationships with our partners and positioned ourselves in the market as a stable company with quality products that you can trust completely. We do all of this to ensure that our products retain all the values and characteristics of freshly caught fish.

Certifikat.topTitle: We are dedicated to sustainability, and we certify our processes.
Certifikat.title1: Sustainability as the Foundation of Business.
Certifikat.text1: Marikomerc Group plays a crucial role in environmental protection and resource conservation. We strive to leave a sustainable world for our children and future generations without compromise. We are environmentally conscious, and the protection of oceans and preservation of fish stocks are our priorities.
Certifikat.text2: Numerous well-deserved certifications for food safety, quality management, and nutritionally rich products are evidence of our quality and your safety and trust in us and our products.
Certifikat.text3: Customers are our value, and their satisfaction is a guide to successful business in the future. Every year, we conduct an analysis of customer satisfaction, and based on it, we elevate our business and production processes to the highest level.

Perla.topTitle: Benefits for Professionals of Doing Business with Us
Perla.title: Do you need our products for your restaurant, bar, or retail business?
Perla.contactUs: Contact us and take advantage of our benefits:
Perla.line3: fast logistics to easily plan your inventory
Perla.line4: customization of products and packaging according to your preferences
Perla.line5: PERLA CHEF ACADEMY workshops for chefs

Perla2.title: Proudly Introducing Our High-Quality Brand, Perla Biser Mora
Perla2.subTitle: Top-quality seafood is our passion and commitment to consumers. It's what we know and have been doing for years. We take exceptional pride in the products we develop for the professional segment, and it brings us joy to share them with everyone. That's why we've created the Perla product line, making the preparation of imaginative dishes easy and enjoyable.
Perla2.karamarkoText: We take pride in all our recipes, developed in collaboration with our chef, Tomislav Karamarko.

Horeca.accordion1Title: Where can I see your assortment?
Horeca.accordion1Text: You can view our assortment on the website or in our catalog. Additionally, more information about the items is available by phone or email.
Horeca.accordion2Title: How can I order your products?
Horeca.accordion2Text: You can order our products by phone, email, or through our field sales representatives. Delivery to locations covered by transport will be arranged on the next available date. Orders can also be personally picked up at one of our wholesale branches during business hours.
Horeca.accordion3Text: In our wholesale branches, individuals can purchase products from our range. Our products are also available for purchase at all DI Maris fish markets.
Horeca.accordion4Text: The headquarters and central warehouse of Marikomerc d.o.o. are located in the industrial zone of Graba in Poličnik. Additionally, our products are available at our distribution centers in Rijeka, Milutina Barača 19, and Dubrovnik, Sustjepanska obala 34.
Horeca.accordion5Title: Do you deliver your products to customers?
Horeca.accordion5Text: We provide capillary delivery service directly to the address of the business entity for our business partners.
Horeca.Title: Every day we deliver to over 400 sales points in Croatia
Horeca.Text: 3 distribution centers located from Rijeka to Dubrovnik and partners in Zagreb and Split enable optimal capillarity, and a renewed fleet of 23 refrigerated trucks guarantees a secure cold chain and fast deliveries. With our logistic support, you can better plan your stocks and achieve savings.
